meanings.sent1: The handmaids in the palace were always ready to assist the queen.
meanings.sent2: The handmaids cleaned the house and cooked meals for the family.
meanings.sent3: The handmaids accidentally mixed up the laundry and turned all the clothes pink!
meanings.sent4: She ruled over her domain like a queen with her loyal handmaids by her side.
meanings.sent5: The handmaids wore matching uniforms, making them easily recognizable in the castle.

meanings.definition: A woman who is employed to do domestic work.
meanings.sent1: The kind lady hired handmaids to help with the household chores.
meanings.sent2: The handmaids dusted the furniture and watered the plants every day.
meanings.sent3: The handmaids tried to bake a cake but ended up making a mess in the kitchen!
meanings.sent4: She treated her handmaids like family, appreciating their hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The handmaids worked tirelessly to keep the house clean and organized.

meanings.definition: A female servant in a royal or noble household.
meanings.sent1: The handmaids in the castle wore elegant uniforms befitting their status.
meanings.sent2: The handmaids attended to the needs of the royal family with grace and poise.
meanings.sent3: The handmaids accidentally spilled tea on the king's robe during breakfast!
meanings.sent4: She felt like one of the handmaids in a fairy tale, living in a grand palace.
meanings.sent5: The handmaids walked through the halls of the palace, their footsteps echoing in the grand corridors.
